item.description:
Love seafood? Then reward yourself with a trip to Maine. Maine Fish Market Restaurant in East Windsor Connecticut. The just-off-the-boat seafood will indulge your pallet with tender lobster, succulent shrimp, and your favorite fish, broiled to absolute perfection. And, here is the chance to enjoy even more of what you love...explore this fabulous restaurant and discover seafood like you've never tasted. From succulent Pan-Seared Crab Cakes to fresh Atlantic Salmon, the chef's latest creations are sure to tantalize your taste buds. And, of course, all your traditional favorites are waiting on you, too.

So come join us for a night of fabulous and tatalizing dining...Maine style!!!


DIRECTIONS

From Hartford CT: Take Rt 91. North to exit 45 (Warehouse Point Exit). At the end of the ramp take a left. Go a 1/2 mile down hill to the next intersection. We are at the corner of Bridge and Main Streets.

From Springfield MA: Take Rt 91. South to exit 45 (Warehouse Point Exit). At the end of the ramp take a right. Go a 1/2 mile down hill to the next intersection. We are at the corner of Bridge and Main Streets.

Address: Maine Fish Market Restaurant
60 Bridge Street, Warehouse Point, East Windsor, CT 06088

Phone Number: 860.623.2281
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on the table/ ask for Terri Bruno's table

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Our September Meetup...Maine Fish Market & Restaurant in East Windsor!
